text: "Heavy Is the Head" is a 2015 song by country band Zac Brown Band featuring Chris Cornell. It is the second single from their fourth studio album Jekyll + Hyde. It was released on rock radio instead of country radio. It went to number 1 on the Canadian Billboard Rock chart and number 14 Billboard Hot Rock & Alternative charts. ==References== Category:2015 songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Southern rock songs Category:Heavy metal Category:Zac Brown Band songs Category:Chris Cornell songs
title: Heavy Is the Head (song)
